text:
This New Game of Thrones Season 7 Trailer Is Full of Dragons, Battles and Ominous Messages

It’s summer, but everybody’s looking forward to winter and this new Game of Thrones trailer makes one thing clear: Winter is here. The new Game of Thrones season seven trailer…
